title: Rowdy Baby Lyrics Meaning In English
stanzas:
Rowdy Baby Lyrics Meaning in English. Rowdy means 'hooligan' and baby means 'baby', Heroine call's the hero with this cute name Rowdy babyÂ  as hero is a villain (& hero) in the movie as well her lover. Below is meaning of full lyrics.
Lyrics in Thanglish hey en goli sodave en kari kuzhambe un kutty puppy naan take me take me heyy en silukku satta en weightu katta.. love sotta sotta talk me talk me me dear machchan nee manasu vachchaa namma urasikkalaam nenju jigu jigu jaa my dear rani en dreamla vaa nee namma onnaa sera fire paththikiruchaa raa namma beachu pakkam pothaam oru dappan kuththu vesthaam nee ennudaiya rowdy baby raa you're only my girl friendu. I'll give you poochchendu. we'll make us new trendu baby. pothaam, vesthaam rowdy baby girl friendu poochendu trendu baby. rowdy baby... unnaala, aei moodaachu my hormone-u balance-u.. damageu.. ei kamachi.. en meenaachi... indha maarikkum un mela kannaachu.. one plus onnu two maamaa you plus me three maamaa adi jhansi rani en krishnaveni I'll buy u pony atha ottinu vaa nee. en mandhiravadhi nee kedikku kedi naan unnnula paadhi namma semma jodi. rowdy baby ye rowdy baby rowdy baby.. rowdy baby. hey en goli sodave en kari kuzhambe un kutty puppy naan take me take me heyy en silukku satta en weightu katta.. love sotta sotta talk me talk me me dear machchan nee manasu vachchaa namma urasikkalaam nenju jigu jigu jaa my dear rani en dreamla vaa nee namma onnaa sera fire paththikiruchaa raa namma beachu pakkam pothaam oru dappan kuththu vesthaam nee ennudaiya rowdy baby raa you're only my girl friendu. I'll give you poochchendu. we'll make us new trendu baby. rowdy baby rowdy baby rowdy baby rowdy baby
English Translation My goli soda my non-veg side dish I'm your adorable puppy take me take me my silk shirt my country girl with loads of love talk me talk me my dear friend if you like it we can live together heart goes mmm mmm my dear princess come in my dream it will be hot while we join together come lets go to beach side. Lets do a dance with high beat you are my rowdy baby. Come, you're my girl friend. I'll give you bunch of flowers. Lets make that as new trend, baby. Lets go, dance rowdy baby my girl friend take my flowers its a trend my baby. Rowdy baby... I'm romantic coz of you, damaged my hormone balance. Hey Kamachi my Menaachi this Maari has an eye on you. One plus one is two my dear. You plus me is three my dear. Hey Jhansi Rani my Krishnaveni I'll buy you a pony n drive me with that. Hey wizard criminal of criminals I'm your best half, we're the best couple. rowdy baby ye rowdy baby rowdy baby.. rowdy baby. My golid soda my non-veg side dish I'm your adorable puppy take me take me my silk shirt my country girl with loads of love talk me talk me my dear friend if you like it we can live together heart goes mmm mmm my dear princess come in my dream it will be hot while we join together come lets go to beach side. Lets do a dance with high beat you are my rowdy baby. Come you're my girl friend. I'll give you bunch of flowers. Lets make that as new trend, baby. rowdy baby rowdy baby rowdy baby rowdy baby
